text: I'm in a rush so quick service is non-negotiable for me. I'd really appreciate good food, but honestly if it's just decent and the prices are fair, that works too.
Good food is essential - I won't settle for mediocre. I'd prefer friendly service, and reasonable prices would be a nice bonus.
I need either really good food or great value - one of those has to work. Beyond that, quick service matters to me but isn't a dealbreaker.
Quality of service is absolutely critical - I won't tolerate rude staff. The food should be good, and it would be a bonus if it's quick.
I'm looking for either fast service or good value - need at least one. Food quality is important to me and friendly staff would be nice.
Consistency is everything to me - can't stand places that are hit or miss. I'd prefer good portions, and quick service is a nice extra if they can manage it.
The food needs to be either really good or the value needs to be great - can't have neither. Good service would be appreciated, and fast service is always a plus.
I absolutely require good value for money - not looking to overpay. The food should be decent, and if the staff are particularly friendly, that's icing on the cake.
